title: What IQ of 100 indicates Stanford Binet Wechsler

content.prompt: On individual intelligence tests such as the Stanford-Binet and Wechsler scales, an IQ of 100 indicates that the test taker

choices.label: correctly answered all of the items on the test
obtained the highest scores in the standardization sample
scored at the average level for test takers of the same age
scored above the level of the average American adult

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
